Pre-Game Insights: Austria’s high-energy approach combined with Norway’s fragility away from home should see the hosts win, but with someone like Haaland on the pitch, it’s never safe to bet against Norway finding the net.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Austria have scored six goals in their first three Nations League matches, averaging two goals per game, and will rely on their potent attack to break down Norway.
Norway have conceded three goals in three of their last six away matches, highlighting their vulnerability on the road.
Erling Haaland has averaged 0.94 goals per game for Norway, making him the primary threat to Austria’s defence.
Austria’s relentless high-pressing game, a hallmark of Rangnick’s tactics, is designed to overwhelm opponents who are shaky in possession.
Norway’s inconsistency on the road has been mixed.
Others: Austria to win and both teams to score looks like the ideal play for those backing goals and a home victory.
Correct Score Prediction: Austria 3-1 Norway feels like a logical outcome.
